thread.section_title: North Carolina High School Sports Headlines
thread.title: Top 1A Games: Week 9

title: Top 1A Games: Week 9
text: NCPreps Week 9 1A Preview 2A Hendersonville at #4 Mitchell Game Preview: This is a huge game In the Western Highlands 1A/2A and another huge matchup for the Mountaineers as they try to keep the undefeated dream season going. Mitchell edged Polk County by a single point the week before. They will be facing a potent passing attack of Hendersonville. The Bearcats have an outstanding QB in Mike Schmidt. North Stanly at #1 West Montgomery Game Preview: Two of the top teams in the Yadkin Valley 1A will square off. North Stanly has one of the best RB in North Carolina in Antonio Williams. The Comets need a big win to give them momentum for the rest of the season. West Montgomery is one of the favorites to go far in the 1AA playoffs this season. They also have a standout RB in Fred Lomax. The Warriors are hard to beat in Mt. Gilead. Lakewood at #6 James Kenan Game Preview: Lakewood is the only undefeated team in Carolina 1A Conference play. They are coming off an impressive win over Rosewood, who knocked off state power James Kenan a week before. James Kenan has a chance to force a 3-way tie at the top with a big win. The Tigers have a good QB in Ken Avent III to lead their offense. HM 2A Ashe County at #8 East Wilkes Game Preview: First place is on the line in Ronda in the Mountain Valley 1A/2A. Both teams are undefeated in conference play and the Cardinals are perfect on the season. Ashe will have a good passing attack led by WR Maison McNeil. The Huskies have the ability to put a lot of points up. East Wilkes is off to the best start in their school history and a big win over a 2AA school will put the Cardinals on top by themselves. East has a lot of seniors that they depend on and Coach JK Adkins has molded this group into a solid group Talk about it in 1A Football FEATURED PRODUCTS
